markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Poison Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4719) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 129 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48) (Level 4), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 4), [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=239) (Level 4), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=259) (Level 4)

</column>

---

Your affinity for the natural world grants you protection against some of its dangers. You gain poison resistance equal to half your level, and you gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against poisons.
name: Poison Resistance
